prompts: Create a group of psychic-type Pokemon resembling small eggs with cute faces.
I want a Pokemon that looks like a cluster of eggs, showcasing different expressions.
Generate an adorable grass-type Pokemon with soft pastel colors and round shapes.

Imagine a quirky Pokemon design featuring multiple egg-like creatures with unique traits.
Design a charming nature-themed Pokemon that has a collection of smiling eggs.
Show me a Pokemon that embodies the spirit of friendship through its egg-like appearance.

distinctive_features: Small size with a compact grouping
